subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Phil Kessel scored twice, and the Toronto Maple Leafs netted four goals during a nine-minute stretch to chase the Vezina Trophy winner Tuukka Rask and rout the visiting Boston Bruins, 6-1.
snippet: Phil Kessel scored twice, and the Toronto Maple Leafs netted four goals during a nine-minute stretch to chase the Vezina Trophy winner Tuukka Rask and rout the visiting Boston Bruins, 6-1.
